body_content.explanation: the quality of having been recently created or having started to exist recently:
examples: Kids lose their enthusiasm for things when the sense of newness wears off.
The newness of the museum has contributed to the initial large crowds.

body_content.explanation: the quality of being different from other similar things:
examples: I just remember the complete newness of what the director did.
Audiences today still find excitement and newness in his work.

body_content.explanation: the fact of not yet being familiar or experienced with something:
examples: Various problems arise from his newness to national politics.
